oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Daniel Fenten Cocke
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oval-framed portrait of Daniel Fenten Cocke. He was married to Margaret Robertson. Cocke was a supply officer for General Robert E. Lee and a colonel until the end of the war, at which point he was made a general. The Cockes were from Sequatchie County, outside of Chattanooga, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
